name: Vapestick
overview:
VAPESTICK® is a premium-brand range of electronic cigarettes and accessories.

Electronic cigarettes provide a less costly and cleaner alternative to smoking tobacco, that can be used anywhere without breaching smoking ban laws.

The VAPESTICK product range includes rechargeable and disposable electronic cigarettes and e-cigars, in a range of styles, nicotine strengths and flavours. Accessories include portable charging cases and battery upgrades.

Co-founded by Michael Clapper and Michiel Carmel in 2010 with its Head Office in Stanmore, Middlesex, the VAPESTICK brand was initially launched online at www.vapestick.co.uk in November 2010.

Since then, VAPESTICK products are now also stocked by thousands of high street retailers across the UK, including Tesco, Harrods, Costco, Makro and Argos. Independent retailers include; Chemists, Newsagents, Petrol Station Forecourts, Convenience Stores, Casinos, Bars and Clubs.

All VAPESTICK products and e-liquid are tested in UK laboratories to ensure safety, no contaminants and accuracy of contents.

VAPESTICK is a founding board member of ECITA - the European Electronic Cigarette Industry Trade Association.
